title: "Philly"
desc:
Post 2245
- A stolen camera from a victim of Olsen in Philadelphia, where he worked before. The film inside captured his last night in the city.
- Counts as a <:red:1106234051129507932> + <:tinsect:1172249217272643604> card for the effects of <:tinsect:1172249217272643604>.
- Draw a card. It will have **Ethereal** added to it. If this effect activated on a <:red:1106234051129507932> card, draw another.
